message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your company.
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair value for my product. I'm willing to lower the price to $11000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the benefits the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair value for my product. I'm willing to lower the price to $10800. This is a great deal for you, considering the benefits the product will bring to your business, and I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10800 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9500, as I mentioned before. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're sticking to your original offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair value for my product. I'm willing to lower the price to $10500. This is a great deal for you, considering the benefits the product will bring to your business, and I'm willing to meet you at a price that's close to your original offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9000, as I mentioned earlier. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
